handoff.objective: Complete authoring with explicit task contracts and readiness for executor handoff on deployment model directive.

directive.title: deployment model
directive.summary: Establish deployment model and infrastructure through front-loaded branch controls, then environment and release guardrails.
goals: Establish and document branch controls for dev/prod release safety.
Standardize environment and secret management for test and production scopes.
Enforce CI and release guardrails so prod promotion only occurs through validated PR flow.
directive.definition_of_done: Branch protections, CI guardrails, environment setup docs, and release runbook are implemented and validated for safe dev-to-prod promotion.
acceptance_criteria: Branch policies and protections are documented and verifiable
CI lint/typecheck and integration test-env checks exist and pass
Production promotion path is constrained to dev->prod PR flow with approvals
Operational docs and closeout artifacts are present and current

authoring_requirements.completion_gate: All task contracts complete and validated; executor handoff created.
